storyTitle: As Manager, I want to create tasks with detailed information to achieve clear task delegation

testCases.title: Validate successful task creation with valid input
preconditions: User is logged in with Manager role credentials
Manager has access to task creation functionality
At least one employee exists in the system for task assignment
Database is accessible and operational
Network connectivity is stable

steps.action: Navigate to task creation page by clicking on 'Create Task' button or menu option
steps.expectedResult: Task creation form is displayed with all mandatory fields including task title, description, deadline, priority dropdown, and employee selection list

steps.action: Enter valid task title (e.g., 'Complete Q4 Financial Report')
steps.expectedResult: Task title field accepts the input and displays the entered text without validation errors

steps.action: Enter valid task description (e.g., 'Prepare comprehensive financial report for Q4 including revenue, expenses, and projections')
steps.expectedResult: Description field accepts the input and displays the entered text without validation errors

steps.action: Select a future deadline date using the date picker (e.g., 7 days from current date)
steps.expectedResult: Deadline field displays the selected date in the correct format and accepts the future date without validation errors

steps.action: Select priority level from dropdown (e.g., 'High')
steps.expectedResult: Priority dropdown displays the selected value and accepts the selection without validation errors

steps.action: Select one or more employees from the employee selection list
steps.expectedResult: Selected employees are highlighted or checked, and the selection is visually confirmed in the interface

steps.action: Click the 'Submit' or 'Create Task' button to submit the task creation form
steps.expectedResult: System processes the request within 2 seconds, task is created successfully, confirmation message is displayed (e.g., 'Task created successfully'), and notifications are sent to assigned employees

steps.action: Verify the confirmation message content
steps.expectedResult: Confirmation message includes task title, assigned employees, and success status

steps.action: Navigate to manager's task list view
steps.expectedResult: Newly created task appears in the task list with all entered details visible

postconditions: Task is saved persistently in the database
Task appears in manager's task list
Assigned employees receive task assignment notifications
Task data is retrievable for future reference
System returns to stable state ready for next operation

testCases.title: Verify rejection of task creation with missing mandatory fields
preconditions: User is logged in with Manager role credentials
Manager has access to task creation functionality
Task creation form is accessible
Form validation rules are configured and active

steps.action: Navigate to task creation page by clicking on 'Create Task' button or menu option
steps.expectedResult: Task creation form is displayed with all mandatory fields in their initial empty state

steps.action: Leave the task title field empty (do not enter any text)
steps.expectedResult: Task title field remains empty and may show placeholder text if configured

steps.action: Leave the deadline field empty (do not select any date)
steps.expectedResult: Deadline field remains empty without any date selected

steps.action: Optionally enter description and select priority, but keep title and deadline empty
steps.expectedResult: Optional fields accept data, but mandatory fields remain empty

steps.action: Click outside the empty mandatory fields or tab through them to trigger real-time validation
steps.expectedResult: Real-time validation highlights missing fields with visual indicators (red border, asterisk, or warning icon) and displays inline error messages such as 'Task title is required' and 'Deadline is required'

steps.action: Attempt to submit the form by clicking the 'Submit' or 'Create Task' button
steps.expectedResult: Form submission is blocked, page does not refresh or navigate away, and inline error messages are displayed for each missing mandatory field (task title and deadline)

steps.action: Verify error message content and placement
steps.expectedResult: Error messages are clearly visible next to or below the respective empty fields, using clear language indicating which fields are required

steps.action: Verify that no task is created in the system
steps.expectedResult: No new task appears in the manager's task list and no database entry is created

postconditions: No task is created or saved in the database
Form remains on the task creation page with entered data preserved
Error messages are displayed to guide user correction
No notifications are sent to any employees
System remains in stable state awaiting valid input

testCases.title: Ensure system handles assignment to multiple employees
preconditions: User is logged in with Manager role credentials
Manager has access to task creation functionality
At least three employees exist in the system for multi-assignment testing
Notification system is operational
Database is accessible and operational

steps.action: Navigate to task creation page
steps.expectedResult: Task creation form is displayed with all required fields

steps.action: Enter valid task title (e.g., 'Team Project Kickoff Meeting')
steps.expectedResult: Task title field accepts and displays the entered text

steps.action: Enter valid task description (e.g., 'Attend kickoff meeting for new project initiative')
steps.expectedResult: Description field accepts and displays the entered text

steps.action: Select a future deadline date (e.g., 3 days from current date)
steps.expectedResult: Deadline field displays the selected date correctly

steps.action: Select priority level (e.g., 'Medium')
steps.expectedResult: Priority dropdown displays the selected value

steps.action: Select multiple employees from the employee selection list (e.g., select 3 different employees by checking their checkboxes or using multi-select)
steps.expectedResult: All selected employees are visually indicated as selected (checked, highlighted, or listed), and the count of selected employees is displayed if applicable

steps.action: Submit the task creation form by clicking 'Submit' or 'Create Task' button
steps.expectedResult: Task is created successfully within 2 seconds, confirmation message is displayed indicating successful creation and assignment to multiple employees

steps.action: Verify that notifications are sent to each assigned employee by checking notification logs or employee notification inboxes
steps.expectedResult: All assigned employees (all 3 selected) receive task assignment notifications with task details including title, deadline, and priority

steps.action: Navigate to manager's task list view
steps.expectedResult: Newly created task appears in the task list

steps.action: Click on or expand the task to view assignment details
steps.expectedResult: Task displays correct assignment details showing all selected employees as assignees, along with task title, description, deadline, and priority

steps.action: Verify task visibility for each assigned employee by logging in as each employee or checking employee task views
steps.expectedResult: Task appears in each assigned employee's task list with complete and accurate details

postconditions: Task is created and saved in the database with multiple employee assignments
Task appears in manager's task list with all assignee details
All assigned employees have received notifications
Task is visible in each assigned employee's task list
Assignment relationships are correctly stored in the database
System is ready for subsequent operations

storyTitle: As Manager, I want to receive confirmation after assigning tasks to achieve assurance of successful delegation

testCases.title: Validate confirmation message after successful task assignment
preconditions: User is logged in with Manager role credentials
Manager has access to task assignment functionality
At least one employee exists in the system for task assignment
Task history logging is enabled and operational
Database is accessible and operational

steps.action: Navigate to task creation/assignment page
steps.expectedResult: Task assignment form is displayed with all required fields

steps.action: Fill in all mandatory fields: task title (e.g., 'Prepare Monthly Report'), description (e.g., 'Compile and analyze monthly performance metrics'), deadline (e.g., 5 days from today), priority (e.g., 'High'), and select at least one employee
steps.expectedResult: All fields accept valid input without validation errors

steps.action: Submit the valid task assignment form by clicking 'Submit' or 'Assign Task' button
steps.expectedResult: System processes the request within 2 seconds and displays a clear confirmation message (e.g., 'Task assigned successfully') with task details visible on screen

steps.action: Review the confirmation message content displayed on screen
steps.expectedResult: Confirmation message includes all key task details: task title ('Prepare Monthly Report'), deadline date, priority level ('High'), and list of assigned employees with their names

steps.action: Verify the confirmation message format and clarity
steps.expectedResult: Confirmation message is clearly formatted, easy to read, uses appropriate styling (success color/icon), and all information is accurate and complete

steps.action: Navigate to task history log or audit trail section
steps.expectedResult: Task history page or section is displayed showing list of task activities

steps.action: Search or filter for the recently created task in the task history log
steps.expectedResult: Recently assigned task appears in the task history log

steps.action: Review the task history entry details
steps.expectedResult: Task history entry shows confirmation message is recorded with timestamp, task details (title, deadline, priority, assigned employees), and manager who created the assignment, making it accessible for audit purposes

steps.action: Verify the timestamp of the confirmation log entry
steps.expectedResult: Timestamp matches the time of task assignment submission (within acceptable system time variance)

postconditions: Confirmation message has been displayed to the manager
Task assignment is saved in the database
Confirmation is logged in task history with complete details
Task history entry is accessible for future audit
Manager has assurance of successful task delegation
System is ready for next operation

testCases.title: Verify error message display on assignment failure
preconditions: User is logged in with Manager role credentials
Manager has access to task assignment functionality
System is configured to validate task assignment data
Test environment allows simulation of assignment failures

steps.action: Navigate to task creation/assignment page
steps.expectedResult: Task assignment form is displayed with all required fields

steps.action: Fill in the task assignment form with invalid data (e.g., past deadline date, invalid employee ID, or leave mandatory fields empty)
steps.expectedResult: Form accepts the input without immediate blocking

steps.action: Submit the task assignment form with invalid data by clicking 'Submit' or 'Assign Task' button
steps.expectedResult: System attempts to process the request and detects the invalid data or assignment failure condition

steps.action: Observe the system response after submission attempt
steps.expectedResult: Error message is displayed clearly on screen indicating the failure reason (e.g., 'Task assignment failed: Deadline cannot be in the past' or 'Task assignment failed: Selected employee does not exist' or 'Task assignment failed: Missing required fields')

steps.action: Review the error message content and formatting
steps.expectedResult: Error message is clearly visible, uses appropriate error styling (red color/error icon), provides specific information about what went wrong, and guides the user on how to correct the issue

steps.action: Verify that no task was created in the system
steps.expectedResult: No new task appears in the manager's task list and no database entry is created

steps.action: Correct the invalid data based on the error message guidance (e.g., select a future deadline date, select a valid employee, fill in missing mandatory fields)
steps.expectedResult: Form fields accept the corrected valid data without validation errors

steps.action: Resubmit the task assignment form with corrected valid data by clicking 'Submit' or 'Assign Task' button
steps.expectedResult: System processes the request successfully within 2 seconds

steps.action: Verify the response after successful resubmission
steps.expectedResult: Submission succeeds, confirmation message is displayed (e.g., 'Task assigned successfully') with complete task details including task title, deadline, priority, and assigned employees

steps.action: Verify the task now appears in the manager's task list
steps.expectedResult: Newly created task is visible in the task list with all correct details

postconditions: Initial invalid submission was rejected with clear error message
No task was created from the invalid submission
After correction, task is successfully created and saved
Confirmation message is displayed for successful submission
Task appears in manager's task list
System demonstrates proper error handling and recovery
System is in stable state ready for next operation

storyTitle: As Manager, I want to modify task assignments to achieve flexibility in workforce management

testCases.title: Validate successful task update with valid data
preconditions: Manager is logged into the system with valid credentials
Manager has authorization to modify task assignments
At least one task exists in the system with assigned employees
Task database is accessible and operational
Notification system is active and functional

steps.action: Navigate to the task management dashboard and select an existing task to edit
steps.expectedResult: Task edit page loads successfully displaying the task edit form with all current task data populated including title, description, deadline, priority, and assigned employees

steps.action: Modify the task title to 'Updated Task Title'
steps.expectedResult: Task title field accepts the new value without validation errors

steps.action: Update the task description to include additional details
steps.expectedResult: Description field accepts the updated text without validation errors

steps.action: Change the deadline to a valid future date
steps.expectedResult: Deadline field accepts the new date and displays it in the correct format without validation errors

steps.action: Modify the priority level to a different valid priority value
steps.expectedResult: Priority field accepts the new value and updates the selection without validation errors

steps.action: Reassign the task by removing one employee and adding a different available employee
steps.expectedResult: Employee assignment fields accept the changes, removed employee is deselected, and new employee is added to the assignment list without validation errors

steps.action: Click the 'Submit' or 'Update Task' button to save the changes
steps.expectedResult: System processes the update within 2 seconds, task is updated successfully in the database, and a confirmation message is displayed to the manager stating 'Task updated successfully'

steps.action: Verify that notifications have been sent to affected employees
steps.expectedResult: Notification system confirms that notifications were sent to both the newly assigned employee and the previously assigned employee within 5 seconds of the update

steps.action: Navigate back to the task list and locate the updated task
steps.expectedResult: Updated task appears in the task list with all modified details reflected correctly including new title, deadline, priority, and reassigned employees

postconditions: Task details are permanently updated in the database
All affected employees have received notifications about the assignment changes
Task list displays the updated task information
Manager remains logged in and can perform additional actions
System audit log records the task modification with timestamp and manager details

testCases.title: Verify rejection of invalid task updates
preconditions: Manager is logged into the system with valid credentials
Manager has authorization to modify task assignments
At least one task exists in the system
Task database is accessible and operational
Validation rules are configured and active

steps.action: Navigate to the task management dashboard and select an existing task to edit
steps.expectedResult: Task edit page loads successfully displaying the task edit form with current task data

steps.action: Clear the task title field leaving it empty
steps.expectedResult: Validation error message appears indicating 'Task title is required' or similar error message

steps.action: Enter a past date in the deadline field (e.g., yesterday's date)
steps.expectedResult: Validation error message appears indicating 'Deadline must be a future date' or similar error message

steps.action: Enter an invalid priority value or select an option outside the allowed priority range
steps.expectedResult: Validation error message appears indicating 'Invalid priority value' or similar error message

steps.action: Attempt to remove all assigned employees without adding new ones, leaving the task unassigned
steps.expectedResult: Validation error message appears indicating 'At least one employee must be assigned' or similar error message

steps.action: Click the 'Submit' or 'Update Task' button while validation errors are present
steps.expectedResult: Form submission is blocked, no data is sent to the server, and all validation error messages remain visible on the screen with clear indication of which fields need correction

steps.action: Correct the task title by entering a valid title
steps.expectedResult: Validation error for the title field disappears

steps.action: Correct the deadline by entering a valid future date
steps.expectedResult: Validation error for the deadline field disappears

steps.action: Select a valid priority value
steps.expectedResult: Validation error for the priority field disappears

steps.action: Assign at least one valid employee to the task
steps.expectedResult: Validation error for employee assignment disappears and all validation errors are now cleared

steps.action: Click the 'Submit' or 'Update Task' button after correcting all errors
steps.expectedResult: Form is submitted successfully, task is updated in the database, and confirmation message is displayed

postconditions: Task is only updated after all validation errors are corrected
Invalid data is not saved to the database
Manager remains on the task edit page until successful submission
System maintains data integrity by preventing invalid updates

testCases.title: Ensure notifications are sent upon reassignment
preconditions: Manager is logged into the system with valid credentials
Manager has authorization to modify task assignments
At least one task exists with one or more employees assigned
Multiple available employees exist in the system for reassignment
Notification system is active and functional
Test employees have valid notification channels configured

steps.action: Navigate to the task management dashboard and select an existing task with assigned employees
steps.expectedResult: Task edit page loads successfully displaying current task details and assigned employees

steps.action: Note the currently assigned employees for reference
steps.expectedResult: Current employee assignments are clearly visible in the form

steps.action: Remove one or more currently assigned employees from the task
steps.expectedResult: Selected employees are removed from the assignment list

steps.action: Add one or more different available employees to the task assignment
steps.expectedResult: New employees are successfully added to the assignment list

steps.action: Click the 'Submit' or 'Update Task' button to save the reassignment
steps.expectedResult: System processes the update within 2 seconds, task reassignment is saved successfully, and confirmation message is displayed stating 'Task updated successfully'

steps.action: Access the notification system or notification log to verify sent notifications
steps.expectedResult: Notification system shows that notifications were generated for all affected employees within 5 seconds of the update

steps.action: Verify notification was sent to the newly assigned employee(s)
steps.expectedResult: Notification log confirms that newly assigned employee(s) received a notification indicating they have been assigned to the task, including task details

steps.action: Verify notification was sent to the previously assigned employee(s) who were removed
steps.expectedResult: Notification log confirms that removed employee(s) received a notification indicating they have been unassigned from the task

steps.action: Check the content of the notifications to ensure they contain relevant task information
steps.expectedResult: Notifications include task title, description, deadline, priority, and the nature of the assignment change (assigned or unassigned)

steps.action: Verify the timestamp of notifications to ensure they were sent within the 5-second requirement
steps.expectedResult: All notification timestamps are within 5 seconds of the task update submission time

postconditions: Task reassignment is permanently saved in the database
All affected employees (both newly assigned and removed) have received appropriate notifications
Notification delivery is logged in the system
Task list reflects the updated employee assignments
Notification delivery time meets the 5-second performance requirement

storyTitle: As Manager, I want to validate task assignments to achieve error-free delegation

testCases.title: Validate rejection of task assignment to non-existent employee
preconditions: Manager is logged into the system with valid credentials
Manager has authorization to create or modify task assignments
Task assignment form is accessible
Employee validation system is active and operational
Database contains valid employee records for comparison

steps.action: Navigate to the task assignment form (either create new task or edit existing task)
steps.expectedResult: Task assignment form loads successfully with all required fields including employee assignment field

steps.action: Fill in valid data for task title, description, deadline, and priority fields
steps.expectedResult: All fields accept the valid data without validation errors

steps.action: In the employee assignment field, enter a non-existent employee ID (e.g., 'EMP99999' or an ID that does not exist in the system)
steps.expectedResult: System performs real-time validation and displays a validation error message indicating 'Employee does not exist' or 'Invalid employee ID' near the employee assignment field

steps.action: Verify that the validation error message is clear and descriptive
steps.expectedResult: Error message clearly states the issue, such as 'The selected employee does not exist in the system. Please select a valid employee.'

steps.action: Attempt to click the 'Submit' or 'Save Task' button while the validation error is present
steps.expectedResult: Form submission is blocked, no data is sent to the server, and the validation error message remains visible with focus on the employee assignment field

steps.action: Verify that no task record is created or updated in the database
steps.expectedResult: Database query confirms that no new task was created or existing task was not modified

steps.action: Clear the invalid employee ID and select or enter a valid existing employee ID from the system
steps.expectedResult: Validation error disappears, and the employee assignment field shows the valid employee information

steps.action: Click the 'Submit' or 'Save Task' button with the valid employee assignment
steps.expectedResult: Form is submitted successfully, task is saved to the database with the valid employee assignment, and confirmation message is displayed

postconditions: Invalid employee assignments are prevented from being saved
Database maintains data integrity with only valid employee assignments
Manager receives clear feedback about validation errors
Task is only saved after valid employee is assigned

testCases.title: Validate rejection of past deadline input
preconditions: Manager is logged into the system with valid credentials
Manager has authorization to create or modify task assignments
Task assignment form is accessible
Date validation system is active and operational
System clock is synchronized and accurate

steps.action: Navigate to the task assignment form (either create new task or edit existing task)
steps.expectedResult: Task assignment form loads successfully with all required fields including deadline field

steps.action: Fill in valid data for task title, description, priority, and employee assignment fields
steps.expectedResult: All fields accept the valid data without validation errors

steps.action: In the deadline field, enter a past date (e.g., yesterday's date or any date before today)
steps.expectedResult: System performs real-time validation and displays a validation error message indicating 'Deadline must be a future date' or 'Invalid deadline - past dates are not allowed' near the deadline field

steps.action: Verify that the validation error message is clear and descriptive
steps.expectedResult: Error message clearly states the issue, such as 'Deadline cannot be in the past. Please select a future date.'

steps.action: Attempt to click the 'Submit' or 'Save Task' button while the validation error is present
steps.expectedResult: Form submission is blocked, no data is sent to the server, and the validation error message remains visible with focus on the deadline field

steps.action: Verify that no task record is created or updated in the database
steps.expectedResult: Database query confirms that no new task was created or existing task was not modified with the invalid deadline

steps.action: Test with today's date in the deadline field
steps.expectedResult: System either accepts today's date as valid (if business rules allow same-day deadlines) or displays validation error if only future dates are allowed, based on configured validation rules

steps.action: Update the deadline field with a valid future date (e.g., tomorrow or any date after today)
steps.expectedResult: Validation error disappears, and the deadline field displays the valid future date in the correct format

steps.action: Click the 'Submit' or 'Save Task' button with the valid future deadline
steps.expectedResult: Form is submitted successfully, task is saved to the database with the valid deadline, and confirmation message is displayed

postconditions: Invalid past deadlines are prevented from being saved
Database maintains data integrity with only valid future deadlines
Manager receives clear feedback about deadline validation errors
Task is only saved after valid future deadline is entered

testCases.title: Ensure real-time validation feedback is delivered promptly
preconditions: Manager is logged into the system with valid credentials
Manager has authorization to create or modify task assignments
Task assignment form is accessible
Real-time validation system is active and operational
Network connection is stable
Performance monitoring tools are available to measure response time

steps.action: Navigate to the task assignment form and prepare a timer or performance monitoring tool to measure validation response time
steps.expectedResult: Task assignment form loads successfully and timer is ready to measure validation feedback latency

steps.action: Start the timer and enter a non-existent employee ID in the employee assignment field, then stop the timer when validation error appears
steps.expectedResult: Validation error message 'Employee does not exist' appears within 1 second of input, and measured time is recorded

steps.action: Verify the measured response time is under 1 second
steps.expectedResult: Timer confirms that validation feedback was delivered in less than 1 second (e.g., 0.5-0.9 seconds)

steps.action: Clear the employee field, start the timer, and enter a past date in the deadline field, then stop the timer when validation error appears
steps.expectedResult: Validation error message 'Deadline must be a future date' appears within 1 second of input, and measured time is recorded

steps.action: Verify the measured response time is under 1 second
steps.expectedResult: Timer confirms that validation feedback was delivered in less than 1 second

steps.action: Clear the deadline field, start the timer, and enter an invalid priority value, then stop the timer when validation error appears
steps.expectedResult: Validation error message for invalid priority appears within 1 second of input, and measured time is recorded

steps.action: Verify the measured response time is under 1 second
steps.expectedResult: Timer confirms that validation feedback was delivered in less than 1 second

steps.action: Clear the priority field, start the timer, and leave the task title field empty (if required), then stop the timer when validation error appears
steps.expectedResult: Validation error message 'Task title is required' appears within 1 second of losing focus or attempting to proceed, and measured time is recorded

steps.action: Verify the measured response time is under 1 second
steps.expectedResult: Timer confirms that validation feedback was delivered in less than 1 second

steps.action: Test multiple invalid inputs simultaneously (e.g., invalid employee, past deadline, and invalid priority) and measure the time for all validation errors to appear
steps.expectedResult: All validation error messages appear within 1 second of input, confirming that multiple validations can be performed concurrently within the performance requirement

steps.action: Review all measured response times to ensure consistent performance
steps.expectedResult: All validation feedback response times are consistently under 1 second, meeting the performance requirement of validation feedback latency under 1 second

postconditions: Real-time validation system meets the 1-second performance requirement
All validation errors are displayed promptly to provide immediate feedback
System performance is documented and meets success metrics
Manager experience is optimized with fast validation feedback

storyTitle: As Manager, I want to cancel task assignments to achieve flexibility in task management

testCases.title: Validate successful task cancellation with reason
preconditions: User is logged in with Manager role credentials
Manager has authorization to cancel tasks
At least one task exists in the system that is not in completed status
Task has at least one employee assigned to it
Network connectivity is stable
Notification service is operational

steps.action: Navigate to the task management dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Task management dashboard is displayed with list of tasks

steps.action: Locate and select a task that is eligible for cancellation (not completed)
steps.expectedResult: Task details are displayed with available actions

steps.action: Click on the 'Cancel Task' button or option
steps.expectedResult: Cancellation form is displayed with a mandatory reason field

steps.action: Enter a valid cancellation reason in the text field (e.g., 'Project requirements changed')
steps.expectedResult: Cancellation reason is accepted and displayed in the input field

steps.action: Click the 'Confirm Cancellation' button
steps.expectedResult: System processes the cancellation request within 2 seconds

steps.action: Verify the task status has been updated
steps.expectedResult: Task status is updated to 'Cancelled' and cancellation reason is saved in the system

steps.action: Check for confirmation message on the screen
steps.expectedResult: Success confirmation message is displayed indicating task has been cancelled successfully

steps.action: Verify notifications were sent to all assigned employees
steps.expectedResult: All assigned employees receive cancellation notifications within 5 seconds containing task details and cancellation reason

steps.action: Check the task list to confirm the cancelled task reflects the new status
steps.expectedResult: Task appears in the list with 'Cancelled' status and cancellation timestamp

postconditions: Task status is permanently set to 'Cancelled' in the database
Cancellation reason is stored and associated with the task
All assigned employees have received cancellation notifications
Task cancellation is logged in the system audit trail
Task is no longer available for further status updates except viewing
Manager remains on the task management dashboard

testCases.title: Verify prevention of cancellation for completed tasks
preconditions: User is logged in with Manager role credentials
Manager has authorization to access task management
At least one task exists in the system with status marked as 'Completed'
System validation rules for task cancellation are active

steps.action: Navigate to the task management dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Task management dashboard is displayed with list of all tasks

steps.action: Locate and identify a task that has status marked as 'Completed'
steps.expectedResult: Completed task is visible in the task list with 'Completed' status indicator

steps.action: Select the completed task to view its details
steps.expectedResult: Task details are displayed showing 'Completed' status

steps.action: Attempt to click on the 'Cancel Task' button or option
steps.expectedResult: System prevents the cancellation action - either the cancel button is disabled/hidden or clicking it triggers validation

steps.action: Observe the system response to the cancellation attempt
steps.expectedResult: System displays a clear error message such as 'Cannot cancel a task that is already completed' or 'Completed tasks cannot be cancelled'

steps.action: Verify the task status remains unchanged
steps.expectedResult: Task status remains as 'Completed' with no modifications to the task record

steps.action: Confirm no notifications were sent to assigned employees
steps.expectedResult: No cancellation notifications are generated or sent to any employees

postconditions: Task status remains 'Completed' without any changes
No cancellation reason is recorded in the system
No notifications are sent to assigned employees
Task data integrity is maintained
Error message is logged in the system for audit purposes
Manager remains on the task details or task list page
